what: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Component Analysis
title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Component Analysis
text: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GCFPCA) R package performing functional principal component analysis generalized exponential family distributions. Authors: Yu Lu, Xinkai Zhou, Erjia Cui, Dustin Rogers, Ciprian Crainiceanu, Julia Wrobel, Andrew Leroux Version: 0.9

title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Component Analysis
text: can install development version GCFPCA GitHub:

title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Component Analysis
text: detailed examples usage GCFPCA package, please refer vignette available pkgdown website.

what: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
code: gc_fpca(   formula,   data,   binwidth = 10,   family = "gaussian",   pve = NULL,   npc = NULL,   periodicity = FALSE,   ... )

title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
text: formula formula specifying GLMM model. data data frame columns: id (subject), index (time index), Y (outcome variable). binwidth Numeric; controls width bins local fitting. Defaults 10. family family object specifying distribution link function GLMM. Defaults binomial. pve Numeric; proportion variance explained, used choose number principal components unless npc specified. npc Numeric; number smooth PCs extract. NULL, npc chosen based pve. ... Additional arguments passed mgcv::bam function.

title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
text: object class gc_fpca containing: betaHat Estimated fixed effects coefficient functions betaHat.sd Estimated fixed effects coefficient standard deviation along functional domain efunctions \(K \times npc\) matrix estimated FPC basis functions. scores \(\times npc\) matrix estimated FPC scores. mu Estimated population-level mean function. Yhat FPC approximation subject-specific means. family family used GLMM.

title: Generalized Conditional Functional Principal Components Analysis (GC-FPCA) — gc_fpca
code: # Simulate data and fit GC-FPCA df_list <- gen_data(N = 100, J = 50, run_num = 1) #> Error in gen_data(N = 100, J = 50, run_num = 1): could not find function "gen_data" gcfpca_mod <- gc_fpca(df_list, bin_width = 10, family = binomial()) #> Error: object 'df_list' not found

what: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) and a scalar predictor X (vector) — gcfpca_simu
title: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) and a scalar predictor X (vector) — gcfpca_simu
text: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) scalar predictor X (vector)

title: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) and a scalar predictor X (vector) — gcfpca_simu
code: gcfpca_simu(   family = "gaussian",   I = 100,   K = 100,   beta0_true,   beta1_true,   fe_case = 1,   re_case = 1 )

title: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) and a scalar predictor X (vector) — gcfpca_simu
text: family distribution longitudinal functional data, including "gaussian", "binomial", "poisson". number subjects. K number grid points functional domain. beta0_true true intercept function. beta1_true true fixed effect function. fe_case Takes values 1 2. case = 1, true fixed effect coefficient generated Bernoulli(0.5) distribution . case = 2 true fixed effect, coefficient N(0,1) distribution. re_case Takes values 1 2. case = 1 true eigenfunctions based alternating sine cosines. case = 2 true eigenfunctions based sqrt functions.

title: Simulate longitudinal functional response Y (matrix) and a scalar predictor X (vector) — gcfpca_simu
text: data frame containing generated predictors longitudinal functional outcomes.
